## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves
What problem does this feature solve? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered any alternative solutions or features?

## LJPW Dimensions
Which LJPW dimensions does this feature primarily relate to?
- [ ] Love (L) - Observability, usability, developer experience
- [ ] Justice (J) - Validation, correctness, testing
- [ ] Power (P) - Performance, computation
- [ ] Wisdom (W) - Structure, abstraction, long-term thinking

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request.

If you have ideas on how to implement this, please share (optional).
